articles.title: Petrol and diesel prices may see hefty cut soon; all you need to know | Mint - Mint
articles.description: State-run oil companies are considering slashing petrol and diesel prices by up to  ₹10 per litre next month as the expected profits of  ₹75,000 crore in Q3 despite falling crude oil costs.
